JOB DESCRIPTION:
You will be a key member of the fast paced Pluribus Network Engineering team using your expert design and implementation skills to deliver important cloud services to our customers with the highest quality. You will be implementing solutions that include everything from database schema and business logic to the presentation layer as well as client-side work for the Pluribus Networks NetVisor operating system.

You must have prior experience and a solid understanding of modern web applications from database to browser. You must be proficient in SQL with extensive experience with database driven application. You must be able to juggle and prioritize multiple tasks and take pride in your work.

Requirements: 

B.S in computer engineering or equivalent with 5-10 years industry experience 

Experience developing and deploying J2EE and Django web-based applications 

Database experience using PostgreSQL or MySQL 

Excellent Java and Python programming and debugging skills 

Experience programming in C on Linux or Solaris platform 

Experience implementing web-based front-ends using JavaScript (Backbone,  JQuery,  or other client-side technologies) or JSPs 

Excellent written and verbal communication skills 

Experience using messaging services,  such as ActiveMQ or RabbitMQ 

Experience implementing REST-ful APIs and using OAuth
